a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global economic losses from disasters as a share of GDP
Economic losses from disasters shown as a share of global gross domestic product (GDP). This is shown based
on two sources of economic loss data: Munich Re and Aon Benfield. This is shown for total disaster losses, in
Data source: Pielke, R. (2018). Tracking progress on the economic costs of disasters under the indicators of the sustainable
